casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Arvin Roscoe Hayes No. 287P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 31, 2016 James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hayes, Arvin Roscoe. Daniel Snipes Johnson, Special Deputy Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of August 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this August 31, 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 5th of August 2016 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of August 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th of August 2016 by State of NC in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of August 2016."
